text:
Slowdown? I've had the PS2 version for years and finished it a couple of times, and I don't remember any "horrible" slowdown. Yes, there were slowdowns in some parts, but it wasn't too bad.

Worse problem is the texture jitter in the PS2 version, but after a while you get used to that.
